item.title: Mapping the Tunisian Revolution
item.description: TL;DR You can make hexmaps easily from a shapefile with the geogrid package in R. To sort out the geography for shapefiles with polygons of highly variant sizes, there is a workaround I found with the cartogram package. Introduction R provides a growing number of mapping packages. In this post I document my workflow for producing a map of the diffusion of protest during the Tunisian Revolution.
